channel.title: Server ideas
channel.description:
I'm hopefully releasing BETA soon for my project, Oberon. I will most likely remove some content before then due to the opinions of others when it comes to some key content. I know there are many topics that are asking for opinions about what a server should include, but I will make sure to keep it limited.
The most important thing that a server can offer is content. I know for a fact that my server will have features around the release of Godwars; however, I'm still debating bosses like the Nex, Nomad, and things around that era.
Some things that I'll most likely include that don't really involve bosses are:
[ul][li]Overloads (Fully working potion creating; will be untradeable)[/li] [li]Chaotics (I don't really want to add Dungeoneering, so I'm up for any ideas on how they should be obtained)[/li] [li]Summoning (Players will love this due to the ease of bossing and this will also boost the economy if my theory is correct)[/li] [li]100% Fight Caves (I've done it on real RS and on a private server with all 63 waves and it was worth it; once you complete the fight caves once to gain the fire cape, you will then be able to do it again to gain the Tokhaar-kal cape)[/li][/ul]
I might update the above list more tomorrow, but for now just let me hear your thoughts about my idea for server content.

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I understand that chaotics and overloads really did change RS; however, it wasn’t just a bad change. Most likely, I’m going to make it to where chaotic weapons can only be used for PvM.

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Summoning didn’t really destroy it.
It’s kinda like if you fell off a mountain, summoning would be the place where you would might land and climb back up.

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Eh? The first three ones are what destroyed runescape. No offense, but…

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’m hopefully releasing BETA soon for my project, Oberon. I will most likely remove some content before then due to the opinions of others when it comes to some key content. I know there are many topics that are asking for opinions about what a server should include, but I will make sure to keep it limited.

The most important thing that a server can offer is content. I know for a fact that my server will have features around the release of Godwars; however, I’m still debating bosses like the Nex, Nomad, and things around that era.

Some things that I’ll most likely include that don’t really involve bosses are:

[li]Chaotics (I don’t really want to add Dungeoneering, so I’m up for any ideas on how they should be obtained)[/li]
[li]Summoning (Players will love this due to the ease of bossing and this will also boost the economy if my theory is correct)[/li]
[li]100% Fight Caves (I’ve done it on real RS and on a private server with all 63 waves and it was worth it; once you complete the fight caves once to gain the fire cape, you will then be able to do it again to gain the Tokhaar-kal cape)[/li][/ul]
